website_summaries.verdict: Powerful styling gel for men gives you the control and muscle to tame difficult hair.
pros: Effective styling with just a small amount
Fragrant scent is refreshing but not overpowering
Works great for medium to thick hair
Alcohol-free, so it doesn't dry out hair

customer_reviews.title: I bought this as a gift for a 16 year ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for a 16 year old suffering from inflated ego syndrome. This hair gel helped take his already out of control self image to a whole new level. After using this product, he now believes he is a god on earth and that no other teen boy can compare to him in sheer awesomeness. We may have to remove all of the mirrors and reflective surfaces from our home. Thanks Johnny B.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: I'm not sure of the authenticity of the product due ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure of the authenticity of the product due to the color and scent of the product. For anyone that has used Johnny B in the past the product has a very distinct scent and this does not share that characteristic. I did email Johnny B and asked if they have recently changed the formula in any way that would've altered the color or scent and they said it has not changed in any way over the years.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia R.

customer_reviews.title: This hair gel ruined my couch
customer_reviews.text: If you dont like the color of your leather couch, you can use the product to strip it. It must contain some strong chemicals. It took me some time to realize what happening. Sigh.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin C.

customer_reviews.title: Good Bang For The Buck
customer_reviews.text: This product has a medium hold that is easily washed out in the shower and gives you a good amount of product for the price. My biggest issue with this product is the smell, I initially liked the cologne scent but now that i've had it for a few weeks... it really reminds me of the attempt at a fresh type scent produced by roach spray. It took me a while to pinpoint what the scent reminded me of and then one day my wife totally nailed it with the roach spray scent. Some may not get this from the product but I think i'll just go back to my "Gentlemen" hair gel that i've been accustomed to.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be the real deal
customer_reviews.text: I ordered from Top Shelf Brands and the product I received seems to be authentic. I did receive the older packaging which is the clear container instead of the new gray containers but that doesn't bother me much as long as it's not a fake. The gel is smooth/creamy and isn't clumpy or have any air bubbles in it like other reviews have mentioned. Also, the smell is pleasant and not over whelming. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rozalin

customer_reviews.title: Great gel wrong pump for the bigger size
customer_reviews.text: I love this gel! Hold, scent great Was happy to buy the bigger size. The issue is the pump is too small and i cant get my hand to the gel once it get half way. Looks to me that they used the same pump from the smaller size on the bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Tirpak

customer_reviews.title: First bottle was great...2nd not so much
customer_reviews.text: Would be 5 stars if the product was consistent. First bottle smelled like the Original Johnny B I would get from my barber and worked great. I ordered a 2nd bottle when I was getting low, looked identical. When I finally opened it a month later from receiving this bottle does not smell like Johnny B. It’s not thick, feels watered down and has a weird smell. I am not sure if this was a fluke or not but I am passed my return window. Hopefully someone reaches out.
customer_reviews.author: jonathan renteria

customer_reviews.title: Want to look irresistibly hot? Get this product and it will make you sizzle!
customer_reviews.text: This works super well to shape and hold a hairstyle without sticky residue. I'm experimenting with Marilyn Monroe hairstyles, and this product enables me to create curls and waves that flow with movement, height and body. The results are spectacular! I love it especially because it enables me to create the effect of soft sensuality. Many products create the look of stiffness and rigidity. So it is important to have this product as your secret beauty and charisma tool.
customer_reviews.author: Privacy

customer_reviews.title: Love this gel
customer_reviews.text: After trying so many different types of hair gels we finally found the one. My husband and son went to a barber while we where on vacation and we both loved the look of it so much we asked the barber what he used and this was it. I love this gel for my husband and boy’s hair. It smells amazing, almost reminds me of a light men’s cologne. It holds all day and doesn’t leave your hair hard, stiff or flaky and is easily washed out in the shower.
customer_reviews.author: TO

customer_reviews.title: Great Strong, Non-flaking Gel, with a Great Smell!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Johnny B Gel for several years. It smells Great Per My Fiancee! It never flakes & a little bit goes a long way... Tried other Brands that were much pricier & they all Fail by Comparison!
customer_reviews.author: Craig Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Does not have pump shown in picture
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I have used this gel before and like the hold but got this specific one because it shows that it has the pump. I like the pump because I don’t like having to stuff my hands all the way into the jar when it get closer to being empty but when I got the product it didn’t have the pump and I was deeply disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: PMA

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t like it ,  bad smell also the color is more lighter than the original.
customer_reviews.text: This is not the original I have a original that is almost finishing so I ordered a new in Amazon before finish. This arrive so fasta I was very happy everything looks the same like the original so I started to try with my kids hair and after a week i notice that is not the same because the smell is different like bud smells so I get the original and the new to compare both and I can tell it’s no the same this one is fake , the color is more light blue than the original.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana

customer_reviews.title: Fake product or reduction in quality
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I bought for my husband from Amazon. The first one was great, it had better holding power than any gel he'd ever used and he liked the smell. The second time we bought it, the product left little chunks or flakes all over his hair and it smelled different. You can see the flakes all over the pillowcase and it's gross. The seller was TOP SHELF-BRANDS. Too late to get a refund, as he just barely started using the new container 2 months later.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Poor hold
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty disappointed in the hold. Even after using a good amount of gel, the hold is still weak. My hair will stay up for a few hours and then quickly fall back down. And I have pretty short hair, too. Also, it doesn't dry quickly and leaves a residue in your hair. The only benefits to this gel over another brand is that it's easy to wash out, smells pretty good, and only has a few ingredients. The practically nonexistent hold outweighs all of that, though. I'm not returning it, but I won't be buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: Shockwave

customer_reviews.title: Smells Nasty!
customer_reviews.text: I have hair that requires a thicker gel product upon application. I bought this based on the reviews. Upon receiving, I opened it up and took a whiff. Nasty. Smells like heavy cologne at a Euro dance club. This would not be appropriate for every day use, particularly at work. Even my wife thinks it smells bad. Due to the smell, I never used it and can't speak to the holding power. It will soon be sold on eBay.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymouse

customer_reviews.title: Keeps unruly hair straight, albeit a bit crispy.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works super well on my thick and unruly mane... at the cost of turning my hair into a helmet. Super firm hold, but still water soluble, so it's easy to wash out. It will seriously hold in it's exact place until you got to sleep, and even then it's still mostly serviceable the next morning.
customer_reviews.author: Lutzie

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my toddlers hair. He goes to daycare and prior to using this product I would pick him up and his hair was most definitely not done anymore. Now that I switched to this product his hair remains combed even after running, sweating, and nap time. The only down side is that it may start to turn white after a while ( a problem I did not have with the other gel) but other than that it smells great and performs great.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn

customer_reviews.title: NO PUMP!
customer_reviews.text: This review is of the seller, not the product which is amazing. When I purchased this product, the photo showed a 16 oz jar with a pump for 15.97. The 32 oz jar is only 19.76 for four more dollars I could have 32 oz instead of 16 oz. I wanted the pump so I got the 16oz jar. The jar I received did not come with a pump! I see the photo has now been changed. had I known there was no pump, I would have bought the 32 oz size it is the better bargain.
customer_reviews.author: EmeraldFrogy

customer_reviews.title: it's messy and flakes
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for years and have been very happy with it until now. They must have changed something because it leaves a mess on the pillows, it flakes off on my forehead. It does not hold like before, I will change brands and not ever use this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Smells Great
customer_reviews.text: I love all the Johnny B hair products and this one smells great. I have very thick coarse hair and add this gel after a shower when my hair is wet. It goes on easily and like I said, it smells great. However, my wife says my hair has a green tint to it. My hair is normally gray, but is turning greenish. Does anyone else have that problem?
customer_reviews.author: John P.

customer_reviews.title: Great product but unbearable scent!
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my wavy/frizzy hair but I still can't get over the scent. It's so freaking strong and doesn't go away. I only used about a quarter size amount too and even with that all I could smell was the damn hair gel. Definitely over powers any deodorant or cologne you decide to wear. Also that smell went on for about 9 hours until it faded away
customer_reviews.author: George F.

customer_reviews.title: Some complain about the blue color
customer_reviews.text: I have heard that it is not good for gray hair from some users. My hair is still dark, so this works for me. Also, this product does not contain alcohol so it is good for the scalp and hair. It hold nicely and gives a nice fresh look. I also, like that I can wet my hair during the day to give it a fresh look and it does not flake.
customer_reviews.author: Abel Reyes

customer_reviews.title: I am pleased to report that this gel gives me what I ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been a 20 year user of another product and decided to try this one. I am pleased to report that this gel gives me what I was looking for. No flaking, nice shine and fragrance, excellent strong hold with that wirey look if I choose....or I can soften it up with a hair brush, and does not ‘glob’ up on my hair. Final notes..I always prefer products with no fragrance whatsoever but at least this one’s is nice. The gel has a vibrant blue color out of the tube but once you emulsify the gel it clears up.. great product in my book.
customer_reviews.author: LAR

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: My barber regularly uses this product which is the reason why I started buying it. The first time I purchased it, I seen no difference from what I am used to with my barber. However the second time, I noticed the product was much thicker than the previous one (although the color and smell were consistent). When dried, this product also flakes and leaves small blue globs which has never happened with my barber. Not happy at all!
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: My #1 Hair Gel Choice
customer_reviews.text: Originally bought this product from my stylist then bought some here for even cheaper. Lasts long, hold well w/o feeling too hard. Rises easily in the shower. Add a little water to restyle throughout the day if necessary. Not sure why some folks are saying it’s coloring their hair blue? They’re probably not putting it in thoroughly OR buying really old product thats our dated. I’ve been using this for about a year now and is currently my #1 hair gel of choice
customer_reviews.author: _steev_o_

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I’m growing out my hair and honestly, I needed something to look professional. This product gets the job done, provides flexibility in the air, and keeps the look all day long! The smell is good, no crazy shine (which is preferable for me), and one can easily apply some water and rework the product. 5/5 for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Hubby Won't Use Anything Else!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent hair gel and smells SO GOOD! Husband has been using this for years and will not use anything else. He's tried other hair gels and was disappointed with their quality. I like this gel for the scent. He likes this gel for the performance - it lasts throughout the day and is easily washed out with one shampoo. Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: JE

customer_reviews.title: Product is not as pictured in Amazon
customer_reviews.text: No pump on bottle. I'm returning this because I use the pump for easy dispensing. Now reading the other product reviews it seems as if it is sort of misleading deal for Johnny B product that is an imitation.
customer_reviews.author: ANDRE STUDER, CMT

customer_reviews.title: Reeks of cheap cologne.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use for my son, but upon arrival I noticed how strong the scent was and decided to use it for myself. An hour later, I have a headache developing from the extremely strong scent..worse than dollar store cologne. Can’t return but good thing it was cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn

customer_reviews.title: Good he’ll
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this gel because it does not make his head hurt like some other products out there. It does leave his hair feeling sticky but, it keeps it nicely kept
customer_reviews.author: Juanita5791

customer_reviews.title: Something was different about this batch of Johnny B's Gel ...
customer_reviews.text: Something was different about this batch of Johnny B's Gel. I apply in the morning, just as I finish showering. By late afternoon/evening, when I run my fingers through my hair, it kind of caky or flaky. Using the same amount that I've been using for the past 10 years. Haven't had this happen in the past. I've tried using a little bit less, but then my hair doesn't hold through the day.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie T

customer_reviews.title: Great looking hair is going to happen
customer_reviews.text: If you want hair like this guy, then this is the product for you! It smells like a sexy man's armpit and holds hair thru tornados. Downside, if you don't blend in hair well, it can leave white flakes at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn M

customer_reviews.title: False advertising. No pump included
customer_reviews.text: WTF? Pictured with pump. No pump included. False advertising. I should have read the comments before offering. Bought the 32 oz last time with pump, but that size is sold out when i tried to reorder. Not even breaking the seal. It's going back!
customer_reviews.author: Sunbakd1

customer_reviews.title: Hair goes flat, poor holding ability.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my young boys... It doesn't hold very well at all. It looks ok in the morning, but by the time they get back from school their hair is flat and it just looks like a sweaty mess. Would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: cereal_queen

customer_reviews.title: Great for thick/coarse hair!
customer_reviews.text: If you're like me and have unusually thick, coarse hair (I'm of Mexican heritage as an FYI) then this gel works perfectly! All gels I've ever used never looked nice with my hair due to not being able to completely hold my hair together, but after a barber experience with my hair used this gel on me I was impressed and ordered some for myself! Definitely will be my choice of gel from now on,
customer_reviews.author: Fernando

customer_reviews.title: For some reason it is not like the one I usually buy
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy this gel at the place where I cut my hair. I decided to ordered it once through this supplier. I can say something seems wrong. Either this is a third party manufacturer or these are rejected batches of the actual production, or obsolete products. The product IS NOT the same. You can easily feel a total different smell (not nice actually) and it creates tons of flakes that I could trace even in my pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Serrano Liano

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SMELL. Stiff hold
customer_reviews.text: It smells soooooo GOOD I wish I could like dot it on my fiancé as a cologne. However, I don’t like how strong of a hold it is. I read a TON of reviews trying to find one that wasn’t going to be like medusa got at his hair and I failed. This one is SUPER hard settling. But the smell is so good I’m not sure i care. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Sam&Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect hold
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my teenage son and he likes it... that says a lot! The smell is great. I like it being in the tub, making it easy for him to get the amount he needs. If his style needs refreshing it works great to just get his hands wet and run through his hair and it looks like new! Great product and perfect hold.
customer_reviews.author: Marci Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Strong Scent, good hold
customer_reviews.text: Strong scent! I personally like the scent, similar to an Axe smell I've been told. But those who are sensitive to smells will really want to pick something else. I got it because it has no alcohol and my hair dresser used it for my toddler. But I will likely get a scent free one for my next purchase. But I love the hold it has on my son's hair.
customer_reviews.author: M. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: This is one of my favorite hair gels!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product for my spiked hairdos and side parted hairdos. I would see this at the salons and never paid any mind to it until one day I tried it and loved it. I prefer the clear jar over this newer gray one. I also did not like that the pump stem does not go all the way down to the bottom of the jar.
customer_reviews.author: M. Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Great hold and doesn’t damage/dry hair
customer_reviews.text: Great gel for my boy. He has thick dry hair. This gel has done the best job at keeping his hairdo in place all day (thru a school day and all the running and sweating of a 4 yr old boy). However does not dry out or damage his hair (as I had noticed with other gels we tried). Love it. Have been using this for about a year now and am still very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: crm17

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Johnny B for years now. It's a great product that does not flake on your hair. It's easy to restyle by just wetting your hair. Best of all is the scent of the product. It smells like you're fresh out of the barber shop. All guys can relate to that.
customer_reviews.author: metrowalt

customer_reviews.title: Using this for many years and keeps my hair in tact.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this Johnny B. gel for about 5 years now. It was initially recommended to me by my barber at the time and never looked back. For reference I have a comb over type hairstyle with a little flip in the front. What I like about the gel is that it doesn't have that super gel'd on look. It doesn't make those white flakes that other gel has. Lastly, it doesn't smell. It holds up in humid weather as I went to Costa Rica for vacation and my hair was still looking great and staying put.
customer_reviews.author: R.T.

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised...counterfeit!
customer_reviews.text: This is a counterfeit! This is an updated review. I recently purchased this product and again and it smells nothing like the one previously bought. I purchased this same product from by haircut place to compare, albeit much more expensive, and it was the real thing with the real fragrance. I have no idea what this nonsense is, but it doesn't smell good and may have been made at Fukushima or Chernobyl. I've tossed it!
customer_reviews.author: DanceMan13

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Used this as a kid, couldn’t find it at a Walmart so I ordered at amazon expecting it to be a fake since some reviews said. But honestly if it’s a fake it’s a really really good fake. Now I doubt I got a fake product because I love it as much as I did as a kid. Keeps my hair in shape and I can’t ask for more unless it’s literally more which I’ll eventually buy once I’m out!
customer_reviews.author: cesar rocha

customer_reviews.title: Works and smells great, what else do you need!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend and he's been using the same gel since college days. I love the smell of it especially when he's embracing me. It's a clean yet manly yet slightly like cologne yet not overpowering scent. It holds well and for those you who shower every other day, it will last you two days if you add a little water on day 2! Any further than two days it can start getting a little flaky but you should shower by then. I can grip his hair and it practically goes back into place. It does it's job and the smell is intoxicatingly attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Smell is too strong
customer_reviews.text: It’s been about a year, and me and my son are still working on it. It’s really thick and definitely helps shape your hair the way you want it. My only complaint is the smell. Really strong smell, and it gets old after a while.
customer_reviews.author: Chitty

customer_reviews.title: Strong hold, yet soft on the hair. If smells really good too
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hair gel after getting a haircut at my barbershop. After every haircut I get she’s uses this gel. I finally asked her what brand was the gel because it holds its style and smells really good. This is it!
customer_reviews.author: abe

customer_reviews.title: Finally Found A Good Non Flaking Gel!
customer_reviews.text: I first heard about this gel several years ago at my barber's and loved it, but didn't buy it because I used another amazing product. Now that I can no longer get that product in the US, I had to find a replacement and this is definitely it..... No flakes, super strong and nice clean look on your hair. Unless you plan to use at a barber shop, I would suggest ordering the smaller version of this though, as the 64oz tub looks more like a protein powder tub :)
customer_reviews.author: Futix76

customer_reviews.title: Good smelling gel that holds my curly hair straight.
customer_reviews.text: This was awesome. I ordered it for my stay at the hospital and it was scheduled to arrive later and it showed up before I had to go into the hospital. The container was in good shape and the product smells so good.
customer_reviews.author: Spiderflesh

customer_reviews.title: Did not come with a pump.
customer_reviews.text: I use this product daily and have always used a squeeze tube of it. I found this one with a tub and pump. Except it didn’t come with a pump and that’s the only reason I ordered it. Thanks again for false advertisement. I will get this product elsewhere from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Mojo

customer_reviews.title: No pump! Not as pictured!
customer_reviews.text: Where is the pump? Just received and I’m returning as the point was getting the pump also.
customer_reviews.author: Charlielou03

customer_reviews.title: Best hair gel for men.
customer_reviews.text: The container has changed but it’s still the same great smelling good quality hair gel that my husband has been using for years. It doesn’t make his hair greasy or sticky. Just the right amount of hold so it doesn’t lay flat or look wet. I can still touch his hair and not feel like it’s slicked. He works and sweats and it still holds all day long.
customer_reviews.author: Anichka

customer_reviews.title: Fake product.
customer_reviews.text: This product is a fake! Don’t waste your time. I have returned. Plus I will email amazon personally.
customer_reviews.author: lisette

customer_reviews.title: It okay
customer_reviews.text: I am girl and I use it for my frizzy hair it Works good, but doesn’t really hold for my son hair also there was no pump thingy so that was disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Sonia

customer_reviews.title: Very good..does the job
customer_reviews.text: I recently started wearing my hair a bit shorter after many years of long and medium long styling. I was looking for a good gel. Based on reviews I tried this one. So far so good. It holds your hair, but it does not seem to leave much residue, which is the part I like. The bottle is a good size also. I can see it lasting for a year or maybe more as much as I use gel.
customer_reviews.author: EagleRock Dude

customer_reviews.title: Cheapest place to purchase and a great size option!
customer_reviews.text: Great product of Johnny B. Mode styling gel that is extremely reasonably priced compared to any salons or barber shops you might go to purchase it. Great product and always amazing how it is gel but your hair can be soft to touch and smells great no matter how long your day is.
customer_reviews.author: AJAY

customer_reviews.title: Smells like grandpa
customer_reviews.text: This hair gel seemed pretty good but the smell is ...distinct. It smells just like the cologne my grandpa used to wear. Thats not to say its a bad smell...but make sure you're cool with smelling like a grandpa before you buy :p
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great product... but misrepresented
customer_reviews.text: Ordered both the 64 and the 16 oz. this review is mainly because the 16 oz was ordered since it was listed to come with a pump when I received it no pump was included. I’m a little upset and feel like it was misrepresented. The product itself was good just the failure to send all that was mentioned is upsetting
customer_reviews.author: kimberly alvarez

customer_reviews.title: I love this gel
customer_reviews.text: I love this gel, however what I received seemed to be a watered down version. The feel & color were not the same.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen A

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This Johnny B hair gel is good stuff. It holds well without the crust you get from the cheap stuff. It also has a pleasant barber shop fresh aroma to it. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: K. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Makes my hair look like plastic. Doesn't hold.
customer_reviews.text: Maybe this product works for people with really short hair but if your hair is longer than 2", forget about it. Unless you like that stringy, plastic look. That alone is bad. Not holding makes it useless. I'll stick with Paul Mitchell, thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great Product/Great Savings
customer_reviews.text: Smells great! Does not Flake! Holds all day long! Great savings. Purchase a smaller refillable container for everyday and travel use so the stuff does not dry out from the reservoir and refill when needed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Like the product Itself , Wanted to try the pump, Like shown in the picture but it just came with the Screw top. Wonder how you'd get the pump applicator?
customer_reviews.author: CATMAN

customer_reviews.title: Top shelf fake!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is not the authentic Johnny B. It will cause discusting flaking once the hair dries and becomes distubed. I purchased from Top shelf brands and this is a total knock off of the original. The real Johnny B is worth the trip to a salon for the quality. thanks Amazon for allowing a knock-off to ruin my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel A

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional holding power
customer_reviews.text: I started buying this after our hairdresser used this for my boys. Even after a long school day or a sweaty workout, their hair stays put!
customer_reviews.author: Mother of 3

customer_reviews.title: Good gel but came broken
customer_reviews.text: My boys have very thick hair so we have tried everything; this is the only gel i have found to hold. I decided to buy from Amazon because I could get more for less money (I usually buy a tube from the salon). The only downfall is that it came destroyed & gel was everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Gel!
customer_reviews.text: Smells like cologne on your head and hold very well without any flakes/glossyness. Bummed out I forgot it at a hotel and have to order a new bottle! Expensive but well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great gel
customer_reviews.text: Love this gel ! Doesn’t leave white flakes after wear and it smells so good. Used to buy it from my stylist but glad I found it on amazon for a cheaper price.
customer_reviews.author: ADRIANA PELAYO

customer_reviews.title: Won’t use any other gel
customer_reviews.text: My husband and two sons love this gel. After trying out so many others they found this one and haven’t gone back. The smell is amazing and holds their hair all day long.
customer_reviews.author: Renae Pirring

customer_reviews.title: One of the best out there
customer_reviews.text: Non glossy look and last all day. Nice smell too, it's also great for kids. Holds hair down with a pea size amount. Need to add more go ahead doesn't flake.
customer_reviews.author: JustAnHonestBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Great Gel! Good Price! Lasts a Long Time!
customer_reviews.text: Great gel! A little goes a long way. This size jar lasts over 7 months! It's big! I would say it has an extreme hold. More of a wet look but it washes out easy in warm water. No flaking. Good Stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Tarot Wizard

customer_reviews.title: Awesome hair product, fam loves it
customer_reviews.text: My husband and son LOVE this hair product. We would always buy it at our local barber shop but they always ran out and then started jacking up the prices so we looked on here and found it. Holds hair in place really well without it being hard or sticky.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina86

customer_reviews.title: Great product, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.text: We usually buy this hair product from my stylist, however I saw it on Amazon and it’s much cheaper! I like the way the ‘gel’ stays pliable while applying it, but then hardens a bit for a wet look. The only issue I have is that my son (age 8) messes with his hair throughout the day, and that softens it and it loses its firmness. But, we have yet to find a gel that can outlast an energetic boy.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Poduska

customer_reviews.title: Great gel, scent is way too strong
customer_reviews.text: This gel works great, I bought it for my 6 year old son to use by himself. Problem is, the smell is SO STRONG I couldn't let him wear it to school anymore. He smelled like a man who put on way too much cologne! It burned my nose!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As good as anything but won't change your life
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it was 'top rated' on a men's care site. It has a pretty mild hold which is fine if that's what you want but I need a much stronger hold. Easy way to tell how good the hold is by how easy it is to wash off your hands. If it's pretty easy to rinse off then it's probably not a strong hold. It's fine but not better than anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Okay product.
customer_reviews.text: This product came with stain of gel all around outside of jar and no second layer lid inside the fist lid. This is just like they have big jar of it and when ordered they just scoop up and put into smaller jar.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Ung

customer_reviews.title: Works and smells great
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using Johnny B for about 8 yrs now and I can’t help but recommend it. My girl like the scent and I like the hold.
customer_reviews.author: J. Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: Smells great and holds better
customer_reviews.text: Found this gel at my kids haircut salon. Fell in love with how soft it dries but how well it holds. This is a better price and smells the exact same way. Amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Gel Ever
customer_reviews.text: My husband has used this gel for years. It’s the only one we’ve found that holds his thick stubborn hair down but doesn’t get crunchy or flakey or itch his head. I have colored hair and use it on occasion too since it’s alcohol free and safe for colored hair.
customer_reviews.author: Cherice Quackenbush

customer_reviews.title: Smells great, but makes the hear too stiff
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell of it, but it made my hair way too stiff. I thought it is a medium hold rather than extra firm.
customer_reviews.author: juliana

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: This is by far our favorite gel. My husband is in the military and goes through so much he it’s insane! This holds up amazing and smells fantastic. It doesn’t leave a crusty look after all day use and it isn’t rock solid either.
customer_reviews.author: Brittnay

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because it shows a pump. The description does not state that it does not come with it.
customer_reviews.author: erik s santos

customer_reviews.title: Different scent, same quality
customer_reviews.text: Before buying I read comments regarding the scent and was a bit hesitant, but the price is what motivated me to buy. When it arrived the first thing I did was opened it up to smell it and it does smell odd. Not bad, just different, at least the smell doesn’t linger in your hair. While this gel does have a different scent than the clear “Mode” container with fragrance, it works exactly the same. Still giving the product 5 stars because it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Rodrigo

customer_reviews.title: Love this Gel!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this hair gel for my brother. It's the only one he uses. It arrived undamaged and nicely wrapped.
customer_reviews.author: Lady M

customer_reviews.title: Worked great once I found right amount to use
customer_reviews.text: At first I didn’t like the smell or the super strong hold but that was because I was applying same amount as I did with my previos gel which is too much with this one. After applying correct amount I find this gel to work very well. It provides a nice hold and no white residue.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson P.

customer_reviews.title: Its good. Very good.
customer_reviews.text: Whoa. I wish I would have started using this a long time ago. Smells great and my hair gets complimented all the time now.
customer_reviews.author: JGonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Good gel
customer_reviews.text: Very good gel, This big bottle last a very long time. I think it is one of the only places to buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Montoya

customer_reviews.title: Best gel ever!
customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing. Johnny B never disappoints. Reseller kept product in amazing condition. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JESAN84

customer_reviews.title: Just like i expected to be
customer_reviews.text: I got my bottle well protected by n a box with bubble wrap and sealed. Original scent which smells awesomee and holds perfect i love this product. I will be buying again from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t smell like the original and it was very watery
customer_reviews.text: Must be fake! Didn’t smell like the original and it was very watery.
customer_reviews.author: YouWontForgetMe

customer_reviews.title: Great for styling hair
customer_reviews.text: This is the same stuff I used to buy at my stylist's when she had it in stock. It works best on medium to thick hair. It leaves a matte finish, not shiny. It can be applied to wet or dry hair. It contains no alcohol and has a light, pleasant smell.
customer_reviews.author: Lewie D

customer_reviews.title: Great hair gel!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my dad. It's the only hair gel he will use. Loves it. Mild scent, holds well, looks great.
customer_reviews.author: A.

customer_reviews.title: 5 star
customer_reviews.text: Noticing the price is starting to go up, but great product only takes a small amount and love that it gets stiff, but not extremely rock solid to the point its hard to wash out or comb.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great for holding hair in place.
customer_reviews.text: The large-sized jar will last about a year. Great price for an excellent product. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Hair

customer_reviews.title: Loss leader
customer_reviews.text: Product was authentic. Did not read earlier buyer beware. 16oz is NOT a pump. The finger digging continues. Guess we'll put in in the motorhome so we don't have to put smaller amounts from 32oz container into small food container. Loss leader bummer.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: My favorite hair gel!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the smell! I have two little boys and this looks great on keeping their hairstyles in place. It's also alcohol-free so that's a plus in my book. I also use it when I slick my hair back in a bun because it works great and keeping every single hair in place!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica C

customer_reviews.title: Must have been dropped.
customer_reviews.text: This container must have been dropped. Unsure if I should blame the currier or the packager. If I was a new customer, I would be pissed off. Thankfully I had a previous container to switch the product to. I was going to give 3 stars at most, but the container was wrapped in plastic making clean up a little easier.
customer_reviews.author: michael ascencio

customer_reviews.title: Love Johnny B
customer_reviews.text: Love Johnny B gel. My boys hair always stays all day. Even when they do sports their hair still looks simi- decent. Everyone always tells me, your sons hair always looks so nice all the time. I always tell them Johnny B hair gel!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Ledesma

customer_reviews.title: 2nd Time Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought the smaller size to try it and have been VERY PLEASED. I have wavy to curly hair and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: JoeJoe56
